ygData.msgSnippet: ... You know, I think you re right.  When a will sapper saw me while I was invisible, I think I was relying on a ranger s camo (so I could zone in without
ygData.messageBody:
On Fri, 12 Nov 1999, Crysarra de'Danaan wrote:
>
> Let me throw in this then as some of you know I play a druid mainly and
> I forget that I am talking to the bard list as i subscribe to a few
> list...and yes definately camo is different than bards song. I
> apologize...i usually like to open my mouth and talk when it concerns

You know, I think you're right. When a will sapper saw me
while I was invisible, I think I was relying on a ranger's
camo (so I could zone in without being attacked).

--
John H. Kim
